001    package org.greatage.ioc.cache;
002    
003    import org.greatage.util.CollectionUtils;
004    import org.testng.Assert;
005    import org.testng.annotations.BeforeClass;
006    import org.testng.annotations.DataProvider;
007    import org.testng.annotations.Test;
008    
009    import java.util.Map;
010    
011    /**
012     * @author Ivan Khalopik
013     * @since 1.0
014     */
015    public class TestSimpleCacheSource extends Assert {
016            private CacheSource cacheSource;
017    
018            @DataProvider
019            public Object[][] getCacheData() {
020                    return new Object[][]{
021                                    {String.class, Integer.class, CollectionUtils.newMap("1", 1, "2", 2, "3", 3, "4", 4)},
022                                    {Object.class, Object.class, CollectionUtils.newMap("1", null, "2", null, "3", null, "4", null)},
023                                    {String.class, String.class, CollectionUtils.newMap("1", "11", "2", "12", "3", "13", "4", "14")},
024                    };
025            }
026    
027            @BeforeClass
028            public void setupCacheManager() {
029                    cacheSource = new SimpleCacheSource();
030            }
031    
032            @Test(dataProvider = "getCacheData")
033            public <K, V> void testGetCache(final Class<K> keyClass, final Class<V> valueClass, final Map<K, V> data) {
034                    final Cache<K, V> cache = cacheSource.getCache("test");
035                    assertNotNull(cache);
036                    assertEquals(cache.getName(), "test");
037                    cache.clear();
038                    for (Map.Entry<K, V> entry : data.entrySet()) {
039                            cache.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
040                    }
041    
042                    for (K key : data.keySet()) {
043                            assertTrue(cache.contains(key));
044                    }
045    
046                    for (Map.Entry<K, V> entry : data.entrySet()) {
047                            final V actual = cache.get(entry.getKey());
048                            final V expected = entry.getValue();
049                            assertEquals(actual, expected);
050                    }
051                    cache.clear();
052                    for (K key : data.keySet()) {
053                            assertFalse(cache.contains(key));
054                    }
055            }
056    }
